sect3.title: Installation of libvdpau-va-gl
sect3.para: Libvdpau_va_gl uses OpenGL under the hood to accelerate drawing and scaling and the VA-API (if available) to accelerate video decoding. For now VA-API is available on some Intel chips, and on some AMD video adapters with the help of the libvdpau driver.
Install libvdpau-va-gl by running the following commands:

screen.userinput:
mkdir build && cd build &&
cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=$XORG_PREFIX .. && make

sect3.para: To test the results, issue: make check. The tests must be run from an Xorg environment.
